snippet: Uncertainty remained over whether Fordo, once a secret site of Tehran’s nuclear program, will be converted into a peaceful research center or instead eventually aid Iran’s pursuit of an atom bomb.
abstract: Preliminary agreement on Iran's nuclear program will allow once-secret uranium enrichment facility of Fordo to remain in operation, controversial point that some experts believe could shorten time in which country could eventually make a nuclear weapon.
lead_paragraph: Uncertainty remained over whether Fordo, once a secret site of Tehran’s nuclear program, will be converted into a peaceful research center or instead eventually aid Iran’s pursuit of an atom bomb.

headline.main: Nuclear Plant in Iranian Desert Emerges as Flash Point in Talks
headline.print_headline: Nuclear Plant Deep in Iranian Desert Emerges as Flash Point in Negotiations

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
